text: I Brought You My Bullets, You Brought Me Your Love is the first studio album by American rock band, My Chemical Romance. It was released on July 23rd, 2002 by Eyeball Records. It was made after lead singer Gerard Way saw the 9/11 attacks and made the band in 2001. Category:2002 albums Category:My Chemical Romance albums
title: I Brought You My Bullets, You Brought Me Your Love
